Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The California places you in the heart of London, walking distance from British Library and Cartwright Gardens. This hotel is close to King's College London and London Zoo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary English breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary English breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at The California places you in the heart of London, walking distance from British Library and Cartwright Gardens. This hotel is close to King's College London and London Zoo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

British Library - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Cartwright Gardens - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
London Canal Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bloomsbury Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
University of London - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Dickens House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Great Ormond Street Hospital - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Russell Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
University College London - 1 km / 0.6 mi
University College Hospital - 1 km / 0.6 mi
London Senate House Library - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Bloomsbury Square - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Angel Building - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Sadler's Wells Theatre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
The British Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.3 km / 7.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 23.5 km / 14.6 mi

The preferred airport for The California is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
